Constructor & Destructor Documentation

phys::UniversalConstraint::UniversalConstraint ( btUniversalConstraint *  Constraint  ) 

Internal constructor.

Constructs this class around a pre-built bullet constraint. This is an internal only constructor and shouldn't be called manually.

Parameters:
Constraint The constraint to be constructed around.
